content.detailedDescription:
This is another "by chance" video i managed to capture.

for two nights straight, beginning 10/11/13, and ending 10/12/13 i observed this "blinking" light that had multiple colors viewed by me with my naked eye and through binoculars.

on the second night, the light was still there, at the same time - 730pm, so i decided this time to film it on my kodak easyshare m580 digital camera.  i set it up on a tripod, and pointed it in the direction of the light, and then recorded the following 11 minutes of this light.

one thing i find surprising and amazing, is it is the same set-up of lights that i had photographed and sent to you in a previous report (case #51739 - two photos attached - original pic with circled "triangle" and magnified pic of circled area), except those were captured seven days earlier (10-05-13) and during the day, and in a different place in the sky.

the most amazing portion of these footage is at the very beginning.  it looks as though after the three main triangle lights are visible, on the left-side of the screen, you will see another white light that suddenly appears and then begins to zip and move at a very high speed across the screen.  what it looks like to me. is that at times, it passes over the top of the "mother ship" (not visible for a second) and then reappears on the other side of the "triangle" - all within a brief second.

it is quite amazing.

imo - there is something happening over albuquerque, which seems to be happening right now, has been happening for the past 30 days (it seems) and it is something not of the ordinary.    

is this tr3b?  i doubt it.  it seems to be something else.

what is your take on it.

please remember.....This my material,so please consider it copyrighted and protected, but you are free to analyze and converse with me on it.  i am at your disposal.

thanks!
content.summary: Triangle ufo over abq with smaller ship flying around bigger ship

content.detailedDescription:
7:10pm 10-23-13. i let my dogs out to use the yard and i see a solidly lit, sharply outlined green oval object that was sometimes half green and red doing its dead silent aerial stunts, right angle turns, rapid ascent and descents, in the nw sky over west la/culver city area. visibility was maybe 5-7 miles. i go in and tell my girlfriend that, "it's back!". she comes running out and watches the stunt show for a while the runs back in for a camera. while she's inside this ship make a direct beeline for me from the west la area and stops almost directly over my head at roughly 70 degrees off the horizon. i estimate that its direct distance (vertically and horizontally) from me was 1/2 mile or less. so close that i was waiving my arms and yelling at it like an idiot. i saw no structure, as the light was just too bright and unwavering. it sat over my head then retreated in the exact same direction from where it came from. then denise comes back outside and fumbled with the cameras controls in the dark but failed to get it to work in time. it had reached the limit of our visibility due to the cloud cover.

this is the exact same ship i saw on 9-30-13 at 7:30pm pst, only this time it approached me directly, in a straight line, to within a few 1000 feet over my head.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: It's back. the exact same ship from 9-30-13. this time it made a direct approach at me to within 1/2 mile (vertically).

content.detailedDescription:
Driving through akron new york i was looking at the clouds since there was a storm coming and there were nice looking shape and color combinations. the clouds were moving quickly so i decided to take a few pictures out the window while i was driving. i took several pictures since i was hoping to get at least one good cloud shot in the series.
i took the photos at 4:21pm and didn't look at them until about 10pm, at that time i saved the ones that weren't blurry or tilted and zoomed in on the clouds and farm house, when i did this i noticed an odd shape in several photos.
the object is cylinder shaped and appears to be made of "c" shaped sections stacked together. there is clearly a vapor trail below it coming from the top of one of the clouds. the image quality is good and you can zoom in to see the details and some odd surface features.
i took a total of 3 photos in 11 seconds, 2 show the object and vapor trail, the third shows the same plus a very bright white spot directly below shaped and sized like the object above, there are vapor trails above and below this bright white light patch.
i did not notice the object at the time since i was watching the road and was aiming at a big target (the clouds) and not a focal point. i noticed them 6 hours later when i checked the pictures so the movement or appearance are unknown to me.
this is my second report in 2 months under similar circumstances, both involved unusual storm clouds and both involved cylinder shaped objects.
my only feelings are curiosity and confusion since i don't know what it is and would like to find out. i do find it unusual that i take photos of the sky all the time and the only time i see these things is when unusual weather events happen quickly.
content.summary: Cylinder shape object with c shape parts, bright light below and vapor trails.

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my way home from work, on the north east side of beltway 8 going towards highway 59.  i live in kingwood, tx which is north east of houston, tx about 26 miles.  i was traveling along the road with several other cars around me, when i saw about 20 flying objects all flying very low, about highway streetlight level. the objects appeared to be hovering, but then started moving very slowly towards the south east.  i started slowing down and noticed all the cars around me were also doing the same thing.  it appeared that everyone was trying to take a closer look at what these objects were.  i did not stop but kept traveling west until i passed under these objects.  i did not hear or feel anything, but was a bit scared. i was listening to music off my iphone when all a sudden, as i was passing under these objects, my music and iphone appeared to stop working and after i went past the objects they both came on again. this freaked me out and i immediately called my parents to let them know what i had just seen. i have never in my life ever seen anything like a ufo and this event caught me totally by surprise.  i hope someone else reports this so that i can confirm that it wasn't just my imagination. 

sincerely,

(i wish to remain anonymous.)
content.summary: On my way home from work,on busy highway with other cars.

content.detailedDescription: I was going onto the upper deck facing west and noticed from inside the house looking out the sliding glass doors two very large, dark blimp like objects side by side.  they were facing nose down like torpedos.I could not not help but notice them, they were totally "in your face." i could only think they were ufos. i called to my roommate to come see and she witnessed it too. we stood on the deck and watched. they were side by side, huge, dark, dull black, no windows or light or emissions, no sound whatsoever. i asked her to get her iphone to take pictures and she ran upstairs to get it.  i saw the craft on the left start to slowly and gracefully move under the other one and start to move north.  i yelled, "hurry, hurry! they are going to align vertically now!" i don't know why i knew this, perhaps because i took it as such a display, i did not feel threatened and neither did she. she came downstairs with her iphone but couldn't get the craft against the sunset sky. by now the moving craft is ascending upwards on the south side of the stationary one. she went to get her ipad to try to take a picture again, but it didn't work either, just too dark, sky getting darker now and the first bright star appeared. now they are aligned vertically one on top of the other.  there they stayed for a few minutes, and then the craft on top slowly  left heading southwest.  it went up very high into the dark sky.  the other one stayed a few minutes longer and then it too left following the same path as the other one. all this while the objects remained torpedo like.  in other words they were blimp shaped, but they were vertically positioned.  the objects did not make any right angles or abrupt movements, it was very graceful. i was thrilled and baffled to witness this display.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.shape: Blimp,   Bullet,   Missile,   Cigar,   Cylinder,   Oval
content.summary: 2 lg black blimp like objects against sunset sky, very close, nose down aligned horizontally; one mvd under the other & up around to align vertically on top of the other. the top one left sw; the lower one stayed a few more min & followed the other one.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Seen from mayfield area, object was a very bright light, brighter than anything in sky, save the moon. it got brighter and dimmer every couple of minutes. appeared to be spiraling towards the ground in direction of waihopai spy-base or possibly rnzaf base woodbourne. did not look out of control. appeared first around 9 or 10pm, dissapeared at approx 11pm. was too bright to be an aircraft, too high to be a searchlight. light was too bright and consistant to be a chinese lantern. lost sight of object when trees got in way, object was still quite high at this point. also observed were bright flashes of light coming from ground in the direction of omaka airfield. these happened every 10 mins or so for about an hour or two.
content.summary: Periodically dimming and brightening light slowly decending in circular pattern. very bright.

content.detailedDescription: I was out running an errand at the local grocery store at a mall along champlain boulevard in ville lasalle in montreal canada. when i had finished and was leaving to get into my car i noticed the sun with the usual chemtrails blocking it and decided to take a photo of it. i did not notice the orb until i opened the photo on my desktop when i got home. the photo was crooked so i straightened it. i don't know what it is, wish i would have noticed it at the time i took the photo, but i did not want to look directly into the sun.
content.summary: Took a photo of the sun behind clouds, contrails, chemtrails noticed it at home

content.detailedDescription:
I saw this object on the way to the community gym.  i came back at 8:35 pm and the object was gone, but there were two jets (sounding like f-18 engine)flying in a circular pattern.

i saw this same object on 10/17/13 around 7:30 pm when i was driving on n. landing st   headed ssw on princess anne.  the object was nw of my position.  i continued to see it as i turned on nimmo hwy and all the way into my community (west neck/signature rd).

the object was unusual in shape, very bright, and twinkling.  i had no idea what the object was, but i knew that is was not a plane (did not move, no navigation lights), nor was it a helicopter (no sound), and was much larger than the background stars.

i was frightened when i arrived home and continued to observe the object (about 15 minutes) on 10/17.  i went inside my condo and had dinner.
content.summary: White blinking orb w/ yellow triangle light projecting below

content.detailedDescription: The observer saw object on june 25, 2011.  the time was around 9:00 p.M. est.  mr. hammill was sitting on his deck while on vacation looking out over the ocean.  some clouds were observed.  mr. hammill observed an object high above the ocean.  he estimated about 1/2 mile elevation.  the object appeared very bright and he noticed the object blinked on for 60-80 seconds without moving.  he noticed the size was compared to a very bright star, but much bigger.  the object was not pulsating.  the object then blinked off and about two minutes later blinked on again.  the object followed this pattern three times.  no other aircraft were observed in the general area. mr. hammill was a member of the u.S. navy and is familiar with aircraft configurations and navigational light.
content.summary: Star like object observed off myrtle beach, south carolina

content.detailedDescription:
I moved into our apartment in july 1 2013 on the 8th floor facing the ottawa river to the north of the building. as soon as the sun set we noticed this flashing light appear in the high sky on our very first night. we watched it and noticed that it simply appeared and did not approach as many of the other aircraft does, because we are directly below the flight path for ottawa international airport, meaning we see many aircraft come and go all the time. once it got dark we can see lots of aircraft (all well below this shape) pass right by it, to no alarm. this intrigued us no end, because how could they not see this item and not report it. so we are perplexed by now and thought nothing more of it because if we can see it, and they can see it and we are on a major flight path, then there must be a rational explanation, perhaps it was an observation balloon for the airport. however, it is now october 23 2013 and we can attest that we have seen this item in the sky (weather permitting) every single night since we moved in and right until now as i am writing this statement. i we have observed it through binoculars, telescope and video camera, and i am looking at it right now, and aircraft are still passing to and from beneath it, without consequence. i am hesitant to contact the ottaw airport or an authorities for that matter. i have observed this item at various times throughout the night i.E., 8,9,10,11 p.M. 2,3,4,5,6 a.M. and even to this morning at 6:30 a.M. when it just vanished as i watched. if you can offer an explanation for this i would be grateful and my wife and i are willing to discuss this with any investigator should wish to pursue this report.
thank you......And i can see it right now from my balcony just pulsating with the aforementioned colors,,,,however clouds are rolling in..
content.summary: Hovering circular object, pulsating in the sky above our apartment, for over three months every single night when sky is clear.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription: It was about 2 am i just got my self settled in bed, my girl friend like always, passed out while we watched a late night movie. as i finished brushing my teeth and turning off the lights, i made sure the blinds where closed in case we decided to sleep later then normal. i noticed the sky wasn't as cloudy as it was during the day and that the crappy weather we had the day before is finally gone, but what really struck me was how bright this one star looked as i gazed up in the subdivision complex night sky threw the window i noticed the star seemed to becoming closer doping threw the stay as if a falling star was shooting down and then that's when i noticed, that what i was looking at seemed to be a craft of some sort and not a craft after all the craft hovered over the houses sitting in the complexes occasionally stopping, flashing a light of some soft changing in color and continuing to hover over to the next house. at this point i freaked out rushed over to the room and tryed to wake my girl friend up she got up and walked over to the window but as soon as she looked over the craft flashed its light and zipped   bcak into space where i quickly ran out side and lost view of it.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ufo abduction, or observation ???

content.detailedDescription: I went out side of my work to smoke a cigarette.I was standing there smoking when a bright greenish light caught my attention. after watching it for a moment i noticed it seemed to be getting a transfer of light from below it..I took out my cell phone and started recording what i was seeing.I was kinda in shock because i am a logical pwtsob and this was not logical to me. i continued recording till a fellow employee calked me to cone inside.
content.summary: It seemed to be one thing transferring light to the other

content.detailedDescription: i was driving on sicklerville road about a mile from my home just past dusk. a bright star caught my attention and i looked up. but then i noticed something else. it looked like a somewhat brightly colored parachute that also twinkled with all sorts of colors. and it hovered and descended just like a parachute. it was very intriguing. i couldn't take my eyes off it. but then i noticed another object to the right. i would have to say that they were identical and they both were hovering and descending at the same rate. i thought about stopping the car to take a few pictures, but i'm sure the pictures would just show a couple dots of light. because they seemed to be very far away and my phone camera is not what you would call state of the art. so i drove on and soon they were behind me as the road turned. but i haven't stop thinking about what i had just saw. so i found your website and decided to report it. i'm sure i'm not the only one to lay eyes on these objects, whatever they may be, and i bet there are a lot of other folks out there wondering about them.
content.summary: Parachute like objects that seemed to hover and descend. the objects glowed and twinkled many colors.

content.detailedDescription: My buddy and i were cooking some steaks on the fire outside and we saw a very bright star. a few hours later it started moving suddenly and it disappeared, vanished completely. we were really freaked out but did not think anything of it. and then few moments later, a helicopter passed nearby and another aeroplane flew into the same direction as where the light was to be seen. i took a photograph of it but it is not recognisable and barely visible.
content.summary: Looked like a star, hovered for hours then sped off and vanished.

content.detailedDescription: Driving home over ashey down 4 miles from seaview sighted small black cloud over the village in totally clear sky.Half an hour later went to friends house for dinner told them about the cloud they took me into their garden the cloud was almost directly above it was around 1000 feet long and 500 feet across it  pulsated with an incredible red firey glow underneath like a blast furnace.To our amazement a glider like unmarked plane appeared and flew in and out of the cloud for about 15 minutes.We were astonished it had no visible affect on the plane.It was a similar plane to the ones i have seen regularly spraying around this time in this area.Having also been stopped by a large ball of light in the road and been buzzed by a black helicopter and had several sightings of ufos this appears to be somewhat less regular occurrence
content.summary: Saw small black cloud in distance half an hour later went to dinner with friends cloud  hovering above garden small plane entering and exiting

content.detailedDescription: I took 3 photos of moon in the north eastern sky at approximately 11pm saturday 19/10/13 in southern suburb of south australia.  when reviewing photos 15 minutes later i detected object firstly at 1o'clock if moon, then 10 o'clock, then 7 o'clock.  that was when i knew i had captured a ufo.  as photos were taken split seconds apart i could see that the ufo had changed direction from east to north east to south west of the moon.  when zooming in on pic i could see a saucer shaped object with lights on the underside and what appeared to be 2 windows under a dome top.  i later checked a previous photo taken of the penumbral lunar eclipse taken at same position a year earlier 25/11/12 at 11.25pm and was surprised to see a ufo with same saucer shape a larger distance under the moon.  i checked the scene in daylight for any obstructions or lights that may have been misconstrued as ufo but the position photographed previous night 19/10/13 was clear of any obstructions.  there was just a clear view if the sky.
content.summary: Took photos of moon - 3 photos taken split second increments - discovered ufo when reviewing photos - object 3 positions of moon 1 o'clock, 10 o'clock, 7 o'clock

content.detailedDescription: My daughter said that she and her friends were standing outside after doing fireworks and noticed a glowing object behind the trees across the street from where they were standing. she said it just floated there for a minute and then started to move. they decided to follow it and it just kept going at a constant speed(faster than they could follow it) and disappeared from sight about a mile and a half from where they first sighted it. this happened about 1 mile north of the town of madera.
content.summary: My daughter said she and her friends saw a glowing orb hover and then leave at a low speed

content.detailedDescription: I was getting off work about 10:40 pm. i always look around when i leave work because i work dispatch at a stadium and it's dark , and i have to walk to my car. i looked up and saw a triangle shaped light in the clouds. at first i thought it was some type of light for an airplane. but as i continued to watch it , i could see that it wasn't that at all. the triangle shape was almost glowing. i watched it for about 5 minutes. i then called another coworker to come outside and see it. we watched it for about another minute. neither of us could explain it. i then got in my car and headed home and called a friend on the way, to tell him of the incident. before i could really get my story out, he started telling me exactly what i had seen. he told me he was putting out the trash and saw the same object in the sky. it was scary, but exciting in the same. i have never witnessed anything like this in my life. almost to afraid to tell anyone, didn't want them to think i was crazy... tried to video it , but the video is was much to dark.
content.summary: Triangle silhouette shape traveling in a circular motion but not in the same circular pattern.

content.detailedDescription: Blue light was blinking in the east sky from scottsdale, arizona. thought it was something on a mountain, until i realized there was no mountain where i was looking out to. the light blinked randomly for awhile, and then descended quickly. reascended, blinked a bit more. seemed to hover and shift left and right a bit, until it took another quick dive towards the horizon and i lost sight of the blinking blue lights below the treetops.
content.summary: Blinking blue light with erratic (fast) flight path

content.detailedDescription: Driving home in dark on hwy 280 going northbound in palo alto, ca after the alpine rd. exit. saw spinning, multi-colored flashing lights, zig zagging then disappearing into sky behind hills. at first thought it was police car driving with lights flashing high up on a windy hill within view. then  it started spinning with rainbow colors, and we noticed it was up in the sky. went from red-blue-white-purple-turquoise-yellow-orange-red. we were shocked and wondered if perhaps the lights were led's because they were so bright. we have seen several ufo's but nothing this spectacular. we watched it for about 2 minutes. i was driving at the time, so i had to look away, but my boyfriend was able to capture a cellphone video of it for only a split second before it disappeared.  we got home and searched "rainbow ufo" and found many similar videos to what we saw on youtube. i am trying to email the video to myself right now, it is taking too long to load. if anyone is interested we can send it.
content.summary: Spinning, multi-colored flashing lights, zig zagging then disappearing into sky behind hills

content.detailedDescription: Looking north east towards the sacramento valley, ca. walking to my car. saw this object fly at a sharp angle, downward to the horizon in a straight line at a 45 degree angle. the object looked to emit white, bright light with a glowing red tail. i first thought it was a shooting star. the speed was slower then shooting stars i've seen in the past, it also looked to be closer. because it was closer then a shooting star it looked to be like a very "big" star. then then i saw it disappear beyond the horizon.
content.summary: Glowing white star like object with red tail.

content.detailedDescription: As the (rectangular) object went from south to north i recall the proportions as being similar to a cell phone. the surface "radiated" and was a pinkish-orange with "waves" or "ripples" moving from my left-to-right which was from its longer dimention/sides.  the narrow front/rear was the part going forward from south to north.  i was so spellbound and busy trying to figure out what i was seeing that i didn't follow it any further than when it was directly over me (although slightly to the left/east).  i seemed not to care where it went; just, what the bleep is/was that.  moments after, i went inside and reported "it" to my wife.  to this day, she says that she's never seen "that look" on my face when i came into the house.  that's not like me.  also what's not like me is to not have gotten up of my chair and called my wife to witness all "this".
content.summary: Object slowly "glided" about the speed i'd seen hot ait baloons; initially, what caught my eye was what i thought was the "burn" of a hot air ballon - it was that colour when first seen toward horizon over property to the south.

content.detailedDescription:
I was doing chores before work.  it was still dark with clods moving in.  the moon was still up and almost full.  iwas filling a water tank and looked up at the moon.   inoticed the strs were moving. i watched large triangle shaped objects escorted by 4 to 5 small objects move slowly and quietly from the sw to the nw for about q
a half-hour.  they either were done at first light or i couldn't see them.  i don't know if they were a squadron of conventional aircraft or not. the lack of speed and noise makes me doubt it. the local airbase is east and parallel to the flight path of these objects.
content.summary: Watched triangle shaped objects escorted by 4 to 5 small objectsfly from the sw to the nw.  they flew slowly and silent,

content.detailedDescription: My wife was driving to work heading south in the wenatchee valley.  she looked up and saw a large, yellow, oval-shaped object which she described as "appearing to be on fire."  she stated that the object was the size of a penny and was completely stationary.  no sounds could be heard.  the sky was completely cloudless and the sun was just beginning to rise.  when she looked away for just a few seconds and turned back to look at the object, it had disappeared.  at this point she texted me to tell me what she had seen.  i called her and asked her to tell me details of what she had just seen  as i was heading out to take my daughter to school.  suddenly, my daughter and i both saw an object just above the hills in east wenatchee.  my wife, who was on the phone with me, also saw the object,  at this point, the object appeared white but definitely oval-like and about the size of a golf ball.  if it was indeed the same object that she had seen just moments before, then it would'v had to travel at a remarkable speed to move such a distance.  also, we noticed that two jets flying very high were heading toward the object.
content.summary: My wife saw a glowing oval-shaped "fireball" in the sky.  it appeared totally stationary and was quite large.  she watched it as she was driving and looked away to look at the road.  when she looked back it was gone and reappeared in the east.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside in my front yard where i have view to the north. i first saw a red pulsating light with a smaller white pulsating light following it. what caught my attention was there was no sound for how low they seems due to the size. i always watch the sky for helicopters and expected to start hearing a sound. but no sound then i noticed how the light seems to be traveling together because the spacing never changed. they were moving south from north at a regular flight speed for a helicopter. i was in awwww because of the red one and the fact i never heard any sound for how low they seemed. just then i looked to my right and another red pulsating light was following to first two, in the same path, it looked just like the first red and same speed. all three equally faded off the more south they flew.
content.summary: 3 pulsated lights in a row 1 & 3 red, low laying equally spaced apart no sound at all!!!!

content.detailedDescription: Proof is better then words
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Speechless
